Instructions.Text:
One of these sounds wobbles...

On every trial, four squares will be presented on screen. One of the two squares in the middle will have a "special" modification, the sound they emit will seem to wobble between your ears! Your task is to identify which of the squares in the middle carries the "special" wobbling sound.
Now the modification that makes the sound wobble will lessen until you cannot detect it all the time. Please try to guess if unsure.

BatteryStages.Text: Here are your results. Please show this screen to the experimenter

Instructions.Text: You completed this part of your evaluation. Please let the experimenter know you are done :)
